channel.title: Munkireport on clburlison
channel.description: Recent content in Munkireport on clburlison

item.title: Fix Munkireport Error Request Too Large
item.author: clburlison@gmail.com (Clayton Burlison)
item.description: Intro I use Munkireport-php as my main reporting system at my work but have recently ran into an error when uploading data from client machines. My setup is using nginx to serve the files. Error message The error message below is what was showing up from a manual munki run with verbose enabled, you can run the command with: sudo /usr/local/munki/managedsoftwareupdate -v ... Starting... Running preinstall_script for munkireport... BaseURL is http://munki01.

item.title: Setup Munkireport on Ubuntu 14.04 - Part 3
item.author: clburlison@gmail.com (Clayton Burlison)
item.description: Ubuntu 16.04/ PHP 7: Lucas Hall has created an updated guide based off of this one that uses Ubuntu 16.04 with PHP 7, which can be viewed here. Intro Welcome to the third part in our munki server setup series. In this section, we will download and configure Munkireport-php on our munki server. Before we get to far you might want to head over to Part 1 - Setting up the munki repo or Part 2 - Setting up mandrill.
